affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: Magical
cmb:
MANA COST: 75/85/95/105
COOLDOWN: 12
desc: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing damage and stunning the target.
notes:
When Multicast, Fireblast hits the same target each time with a 0.4 seconds interval.
Mana cost is increased by 20 / 40 / 60 when learning Multi Cast.
lore: The Ogre Magi is easily amused, entertained for hours by playing with fire.
name: ogre_magi_fireblast

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: Magical
cmb:
MANA COST: 95/105/115/125
COOLDOWN: 15
desc: Drenches a target in volatile chemicals, causing it to burst into flames. The target is in immense pain, taking damage and moving more slowly.
notes:
Multicast makes this spell have an area of effect (150/300/450 based on Multicast level).
Multicast makes this spell have 150 additional cast range for every Multicast level.
Multicast makes this spell have a chance to cast multiple times at random enemy units with 1400 AoE.
name: ogre_magi_ignite

affects:
ABILITY: Auto-Cast, Unit Target
AFFECTS: Allied Units
attrib:
DURATION: 30
MOVE SPEED: 10% / 12% / 14% / 16%
ATTACK SPEED: 20 / 30 / 40 / 50
cmb:
MANA COST: 75
COOLDOWN: 20
desc: Incites a frenzy in a friendly unit, increasing its movement speed and attack speed.
notes:
When multicast, nearby allies will be selected randomly in an 575 area of effect to receive Bloodlust.
Can affect siege units and Magic Immune allies.
lore: 'Running's not as fun as hitting... Not one bit fun.'
name: ogre_magi_bloodlust

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: Magical
cmb:
MANA COST: 60% of current mana
COOLDOWN: 6
desc: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing damage and stunning the target.
lore: The 'who-casts-spell-first' argument between himself is solved simply by both casting at once.
name: ogre_magi_unrefined_fireblast

attrib:
FIREBLAST MANA INCREASE: 30 / 70 / 110
FIREBLAST COOLDOWN REDUCTION: 2 / 4 / 6
IGNITE RADIUS: 150 / 300 / 450
BLOODLUST RADIUS: 575
BLOODLUST COOLDOWN REDUCTION: 5 / 10 / 15
2X CHANCE: 40% / 50% / 60%
3X CHANCE: 0% / 20% / 25%
4X CHANCE: 0% / 0% / 12.5%
IGNITE CAST RANGE INCREASE: 150 / 300 / 450
desc:
Enables the Ogre Magi to rapidly cast his spells, giving them greater potency. Gives a chance to cast a spell multiple times in one cast. Increases Fireblast's mana cost and decreases its cooldown, adds an area of effect to Ignite and reduces Bloodlust's cooldown and gives it a chance to cast on random allies around Ogre Magi.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
lore: Despite being largely incapacitated by his IQ, the Ogre Magi's success in battle is attributed to pure skill.
name: ogre_magi_multicast
